snippet: Prosecutors said former manager Kelley Lynch made Leonard Cohen's life "a complete and utter living hell," sending him hundreds of emails and voicemail messages after he stopped working with her in 2004.
abstract: Prosecutors said former manager Kelley Lynch made Leonard Cohen's life "a complete and utter living hell," sending him hundreds of emails and voicemail messages after he stopped working with her in 2004.

headline.main: Former Manager Is Convicted of Harassing Leonard Cohen
headline.print_headline: Ex-Manager Harassed Leonard Cohen, Jury Says
